About me

Hello there! I'm Rishab Jain, a passionate Web Developer with expertise in React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Additionally, I have extensive experience with PHP (Laravel framework), MySQL, and Python (Django).

I specialize in developing dynamic and reusable user interfaces with React. Additionally, I utilize PHP's Laravel framework and Django for robust backend development, along with SQL for efficient database management. This combination enables the creation of comprehensive, high-performance web applications.

Live Projects

Mitracare App

I have developed a complete set of APIs for the Mitracare App using the Laravel framework. These APIs enable seamless functionalities such as adding patients, doctors, and dietitians, managing doctor and dietitian interactions, tracking dietitian punch-ins and punch-outs, and viewing assigned tasks. The robust API design ensures efficient data handling, real-time updates, and smooth integration, significantly enhancing the overall healthcare management experience.

Technologies Used: Laravel
